detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top’s outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Sandals in imitation suede with covered platform soles and heels, open toes and an adjustable ankle strap with a covered metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 12 cm.

Blouse in an airy cupro blend containing glittery threads. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, pin-tucks at the front and flounces down the front and back. Long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring and peplum at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Slightly wider neckline and short sleeves.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey. Narrow cut with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Jumper in a fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Small hair elastics in different colours. No metal clips. Diameter 6 cm.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Small bag in braided paper straw with a decorative fabric pompom, narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 8.5x12.5x15 cm.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with gently rounded cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a wide neckline, narrow elastication at the top and inset lace trims at the front. Wide sleeves and smocking and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back. Supplied in a gift box.
Block-coloured sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved polo shirt in slub-weave cotton and a pair of chinos in a cotton weave. Top with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Chinos with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Scarf in a soft jacquard knit. Size 15x110 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.
Joggers in soft, airy, patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Boxy coat in soft, felted fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Flap welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Trousers in a cupro weave with a high waist, pleats at the top for added width, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable with decorative sparkly stones. Suitable for iPhones 6/7/8 Plus/X. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Metal ball chain necklace with two flat pendants in the shape of identity tags, one of which is on a shorter, detachable ball chain. Length of necklace chain approx. 70 cm.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Long top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and straight, wide legs.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Satin espadrilles with a small platform, braided jute trim around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, pleats and a rounded hem.
Short, boxy jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a slightly wider neckline.

Boiler suit in washed cotton twill with contrasting colour seams. Grandad collar, press-studs down the front and a tab on the chest. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets, back pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem, and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the hems.
Triangular scarf in a lightweight, patterned weave with decorative fringing.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Double-layered trims at the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a padded, detachable hood that fastens with press-studs at the front, and welt side pockets. Lined.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Large shopper in imitation leather with two handles and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Size 13x40x40 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a round neckline and extra-long sleeves. Additional draped layer at the front.
Body in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Loafers with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles, and patterned soles. Height of soles 1 cm.

Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Airy jersey underskirt.
Jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and cotton corduroy dungaree dress. Patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungaree dress with adjustable straps with a press-stud, front pockets and a press-stud at the sides.
Smooth earrings and ear cuffs in metal. Two earrings that can be worn as a pair or separately and four ear cuffs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable lined hood with a faux fur trim, a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Ribbing at the cuffs, pockets at the top, zipped front pockets and a double vent with press-studs at the back. Lined.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, short sleeves and a seam at the waist with decorative ties at the front.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. No buttons.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with raised details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Wide, knee-length shorts in imitation leather with a high waist, pleats at the front, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and diagonal side pockets. The polyester content of the pocket lining is partly recycled.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Shorts in airy organza with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist, side pockets, open back pockets and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Jacket in a glossy weave with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap front pockets, and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Hat in braided straw with a wide band and a sloping brim.
Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, smocking on the shoulders and short sleeves. Smocked seam under the bust and a short frill trim around the neckline and sleeves. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and elastication at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a vest top and shorts. Printed vest top. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
